Title: Relates to utility intervenor reimbursement
Summary: Relates to utility intervenor reimbursement to a participant for its reasonable costs of participation in any proceeding before the Public Service Commission (PSC).
LawCode: Add ยง24-c, Pub Serv L; add ยง97-uuuu, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to utility intervenor reimbursement; and to amend the state finance law, in relation to establishing the utility intervenor account
